review: I love it!  so easy to use - access to so many shows
author: Mary Billingsley

review: Not much to say on this thing except, THIS LITTLE THING IS JUST AWESOME!!!!
author: Allen Coates Jr

review: Fire Stick itself is excellent,well worth the investment. Delivery took over 2 weeks and the actual delivery date was missed. Otherwise a very good product
author: Trent Ziebart

review: Works great until it freezes up and I have to unplug the power to re set it. I turned it on last night and it kept telling me I had no wi fi signal. I removed the power from it to re set and it worked great after that. One other time the movie froze up and after I re set it from the power it worked great.
author: Steve Cirtaus

review: Outstanding! So simple and so effective.... amazing amount of choices. Very Happy with my purchase.
author: Anne W.

review: Have Apple TV too...needed it for my Amazon prime subscription.  Lots of trashy shows and movies if that's what you like, ugh.
author: Judy Smith

review: Very disappointed! It freezes a lot and I have to take it out of the port and put it back for it to unfreeze.
author: Sorour

review: Love it!  This little thing is FAST!
author: Glenn Lacampuenga
